message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll try to meet you in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, but not all the way to 7k!
You're getting closer, but I'm still holding out for more!
I'll give you a little less, but I'm not going to give up!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a chance to take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up yet, I'll try to get a better deal!
You're getting close to giving up, don't make it easy for me!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to squeeze out a better deal!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up, I'll take it all if I have to!
You're bluffing, I'll take the last penny!
